titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cobaltate(2-), Y6-amino-.kappa.N)-5-YY2hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl?azo- kappa.N1?-N-methyl-2-naphthalenesulfonamidato(2-)?Y6-(amino- kappa.N)-5-YY2-(hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl?azo-.kappa.N ?-2-napthalenessulfonato(3-)?-,disodium.

bill.summary: 1/15/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Cobaltate(2-), Y6-amino-.kappa.N)-5-YY2hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl?azo- kappa.N1?-N-methyl-2-naphthalenesulfonamidato(2-)?Y6-(amino- kappa.N)-5-YY2-(hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl?azo-.kappa.N ?-2-napthalenessulfonato(3-)?-,disodium.
